_header: Almighty God conserve us from care
Subjects: advice, moral; flatterers, against; speech, advice concerning
_description: ‘Whate-euer thow say avyse the welle’ — nine 8-line stanzas

CamTCC1450.First Lines:
Almyȝty godde conserue vs fram careWhere ys thys worle a wey y
                    wente…
CamTCC1450.Last Lines:
…Sende me grace both nyȝt and dayeWhate euer thow sey a
                    vyse the welle
